user_auth_key.title: User Auth Key
user_auth_key.description: OneSignal User Auth Key, see the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for OneSignal API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

outcome_names.title: Outcome Names
outcome_names.description: Comma-separated list of names and the value (sum/count) for the returned outcome data. See the docs for more details
